column4: I'm new with ubuntu and I'm basically a windows user trying something different. But there is one problem that is making difficult to me to experience this.
does any one knows what could cause the backspace button to "click" by itself each 4/5 seconds?
dirty keyboard?  try it on the consold see if it still does it.
I don't think its a dirty keyboard problem, 'cause it works fine on the other OS... anyway thanks.
